treatment.reference: Complete Genome Sequence of Hyperthermophilic Pyrococcus sp. Strain NA2, Isolated from a Deep-Sea Hydrothermal Vent Area
treatment.description: Pyrococcus sp. strain NA2 was isolated from a sample collected from a hydrothermal vent area in the Papua New Guinea-Australia-Canada-Manus (PACMANUS) field of the western Pacific Ocean at a depth of 1,650 m. Pyrococcus sp. NA2 is a sulfur-reducing heterotrophic archaeon and is a hyperthermophile growing at temperatures ranging from 70°C to 100°C and optimally at 93°C.
